rows.label: qst702409_msg0001
rows.name:
Lieutenant, we've spoken
to most of the promising
people in the capital.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0002
rows.name: Ah, thank you! Adel-sama, and everyone.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0003
rows.name:
But, to be honest, we don't know
who or how many will come.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0004
rows.name:
I think someone will come soon,
so can we wait here for a bit?

rows.label: qst702409_msg0005
rows.name:
I want to see if the people we chose
meet your approval, Lieutenant.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0006
rows.name: Yes, of course.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey! I couldn't forget how
cool you all were in the
capital, so I came over.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0008
rows.name:
Thank you for choosing the
resistance! I knew you would come!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0009
rows.name: So this is the resistance's base, huh?

rows.label: qst702409_msg0010
rows.name:
It's a fine fortress, on
par with the Iiran army's.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]You! What's with that
lazy way of talking?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0012
rows.name: Wh-who are you?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0013
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]How dare you ask "who" to
a superior! It should be
"Who might you be?"!

rows.label: qst702409_msg014
rows.name:
A-Adel... Was Veronica-san
always like that?

rows.label: qst702409_msg015
rows.name:
Yes, she's a former training instructor
for the Invidian army, so she's always
like that in front of her subordinates.

rows.label: qst702409_msg016
rows.name: An instructor, huh...

rows.label: qst702409_msg017
rows.name: And who are you!

rows.label: qst702409_msg018
rows.name:
Y-yes! My name is Luc, and I've come
to volunteer for the resistance!

rows.label: qst702409_msg019
rows.name: The response to a superior is "Sir"!

rows.label: qst702409_msg020
rows.name: S-sir!

rows.label: qst702409_msg021
rows.name:
But I'll praise your attitude for
volunteering for the resistance in
these times! You're hired! Now get going!

rows.label: qst702409_msg022
rows.name: Sir! Yes, sir!

rows.label: qst702409_msg023
rows.name: Is he going to be okay?

rows.label: qst702409_msg024
rows.name:
W-well, she seems to like him,
so he'll probably be fine.

rows.label: qst702409_msg026
rows.name:
This is Isabella-san, an active
adventurer who travels the world.

rows.label: qst702409_msg027
rows.name:
Are you the boss here? Look
forward to working with you.

rows.label: qst702409_msg028
rows.name:
I see. Just as expected of someone
Adel-sama found. You have spirit...
and guts, it seems.

rows.label: qst702409_msg029
rows.name:
From now on, I'm counting on you
as a member of the resistance.

rows.label: qst702409_msg030
rows.name: That's only two so far...

rows.label: qst702409_msg031
rows.name:
Are we really going to get
six people like this?

rows.label: qst702409_msg032
rows.name:
Hahaha... The main act
has finally arrived, mo.

rows.label: qst702409_msg033
rows.name: Oh! Those Nopon siblings, they came!

rows.label: qst702409_msg034
rows.name:
Hmm, Nopon... Four of you
together, that's a good spirit.

rows.label: qst702409_msg035
rows.name: What are your names?

rows.label: qst702409_msg036
rows.name:
Hmph, I'm glad you
asked, mo. Listen up...

rows.label: qst702409_msg037
rows.name:
More importantly, what
are you all wearing?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg038
rows.name:
Eek! You're the one who told us
to introduce ourselves, mo!

rows.label: qst702409_msg039
rows.name:
You all need to be re-educated,
starting with your clothes! Go
change into your uniforms!

rows.label: qst702409_msg040
rows.name: Y-yes, ma'am, mo!

rows.label: qst702409_msg042
rows.name: D-does this suit me, mo?

rows.label: qst702409_msg043
rows.name: Hmph, I suppose it will do.

rows.label: qst702409_msg044
rows.name:
But now that you've joined
the resistance, things won't
be the same as before...

rows.label: qst702409_msg045
rows.name: I'll train you hard, so be prepared!

rows.label: qst702409_msg046
rows.name:
Eek! I told you we shouldn't
have done this, mo!

rows.label: qst702409_msg047
rows.name: B-be quiet, mo!

rows.label: qst702409_msg048
rows.name:
Your first order is to clean
the base! If you slack off,
you won't get any food today!

rows.label: qst702409_msg049
rows.name:
R-roger, mo! Everyone! We
have to avoid going without
food at all costs, mo!

rows.label: qst702409_msg050
rows.name:
Are those four going
to be okay like that?

rows.label: qst702409_msg051
rows.name:
Don't worry. They may not look it,
but they have plenty of energy.

rows.label: qst702409_msg052
rows.name: They might surprise us.

rows.label: qst702409_msg053
rows.name:
The six people you gathered
all have good spirit.

rows.label: qst702409_msg054
rows.name:
With them, the morale of the
resistance should slowly improve.

rows.label: qst702409_msg055
rows.name:
We won't be able to return to the
resistance for a while... Please take
care of things while we're gone!

rows.label: qst702409_msg056
rows.name:
Yes! Adel-sama and everyone,
please be careful!
